title: Hellboy - BPRD - Other Mignola stuff
description:
Open with CDisplay

I think this is everything to date. Let me know if something is missing.

1.  Hellboy - Seed of Destruction
2.  Hellboy - Wake the Devil
3.  Hellboy - The Chained Coffin and Others
4.  Hellboy - The Right Hand of Doom
5.  Hellboy - Conqueror Worm
6.  Hellboy - Strange Places
7.  Hellboy - The Troll Witch and Others (not the TPB, just the comics)
8.  Hellboy - Darkness Calls

9.  Hellboy Weird Tales (not the TPB)

10. Hellboy Crossover - Babe 2
11. Hellboy Crossover - Batman, Hellboy, Starman
12. Hellboy Crossover - Ghost - Hellboy
13. Hellboy Crossover - Ghost - Hellboy Special
14. Hellboy Crossover - Hellboy - Savage Dragon
15. Hellboy Crossover - Next Men #21 (1st appearance of Hellboy)
16. Hellboy Crossover - Painkiller Jane - Hellboy
17. Hellboy Crossover - The Goon #7

18  BPRD - Hollow Earth and Other Stories
19. BPRD - Plague of Frogs
20. BPRD - The Dead
21. BPRD - The Black Flame
22. BPRD - The Universal Machine
23. BPRD - Garden of Souls
24. BPRD - The Killing Ground
25. BPRD - Revival (1 of 2, from Dark Horse Presents 8 on Myspace)
26. BPRD one shots - Dark Waters, Night Train, Soul of Venice, There&#039;s Something Under My Bed
27. BPRD 1946 (issue 1 and 2)

28. Abe Sapien - The Drowning (issue 1 of 5)
29. Lobster Johnson - The Iron Prometheus

30. Hellboy Animated - The Yearning (from Blood and Iron DVD)
31. hellboy Animated - The Menagerie
32. Hellboy Animated - The Black Wedding

33. Hellboy 2001 Convention Sketchbook (I haven&#039;t scanned the sketchbooks since, sorry)
34. Darkhorse Book of Hauntings (complete book)
35. Hellboy Jr. (may be incomplete)


36. Conan 29-31 (written by Mike Mignola)
37. Dark Horse - Twenty years
38. The Christmas Spirit (from Dark Horse Presents 5 on Myspace)
39. The Amazing Screw On Head (one shot)
